name: @Install_D99_macaque
author: Glen D, Saleem KS
description: Installs the D99 macaque version 2 atlases for subcortical regions in the macaque monkey.

inputs.description: Use wget to download archive. Script chooses by default with preference for curl.
inputs.name: Wget Download

inputs.description: Use curl to download archive. Script chooses by default with preference for curl.
inputs.name: Curl Download

output-files.description: Readme file with details about the installed atlas.
output-files.name: Readme File

output-files.description: Installed D99 macaque version 2 atlas files.
output-files.name: Atlas Files
